missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. Any figure can attack a door (Health: 8, Defense: None).
{-} If the Courier is defeated, set his figure aside instead. (It still counts as defeated for the purpose of triggering effects.)
{-} The mission progresses when a door opens.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the memory core and the Entrance.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

"Uh, can you guys hurry up? I'm in some trouble here .. . " Jarl's last transmission came in hours before, his voice weak.

Now, Imperial forces crawl throughout this area, likely searching for the very thing you came to retrieve.

Repeated attempts to contact Jarl proved fruitless, but you're getting close to the meeting place. Unfortunately, so are Imperial forces, who have surrounded the structure and are working at the doors with cutting equipment.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. Any figure can attack a door (Health: 8, Defense: None).
{-} The mission progresses when a door opens.

eventActions.tbText:
A lean, athletic man looks like he is waiting for his chance to act.

{-} Deploy a regular Imperial Officer. This is the Courier.

eventActions.customText:
The Courier just waits for his chance.

{-} The two closest Imperial figures become <color="red">Focused</color>.

eventActions.tbText: {-} If the Courier is defeated, set his figure aside instead. (It still counts as defeated for the purpose of triggering effects.)
A fearsome blaster cannon is placed close to one of the doors.

eventActions.customText:
{-} Imperial figures do not block this figureâ€™s line of sight.
{Q} Attack the closest door.
{Q} Attack the closest door.

events.eventText:
With blaster bolts whining overhead and the droid's data core in hand, you make a quick retreat. If someone back at High Command can crack the encryption on this, it'll definitely come in handy.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Rebel players choose 1 hero to receive the "Rebel Recon" Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

You lose sight of the Courier down an alley. Trying to catch up while fighting other Imperial forces, eventually you come to a dead end.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText:
The Courier activates.

Is the Courier set aside?

events.eventText: End this activation immediately without resolving any instructions.
Place the Courier on the data core. He immediately retrieves the data core.

The Imperials increase their efforts.

The Imperial figure closest to the Rebel carrying the data core becomes <color="red">Focused</color>.

Sunlight spills into a musty junk shop, unoccupied save for a large collection of worthless trinkets. A half-dismantled probe droid lies discarded on the floor.

Pinpricks of light shine through small holes scattered throughout the walls, presumably from blaster fire.

A small distance away lies the facedown body of Weyn Jarl, bearing several blaster wounds. It appears he barricaded himself in, but the structure proved unsuitable for hiding.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Place a neutral mission token on the red highlighted space.
{-} The mission token represents a memory core inside a broken droid. Any figure can retrieve the data core.
{-} A figure carrying the memory core can escape through the entrance.
{-} The Rebels win when a Rebel figure carrying the data core escapes.
{-} The Rebels lose when an Imperial figure carrying the data core escapes, or when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Escape with the data core. Prevent the Imperials from escaping with the data core.

eventActions.tbText: Another door bursts inward, and Imperials flood inside.

eventActions.otherTarget: the Rebel carrying the data core

eventActions.newInstructions:
If the Courier is carrying the data core:

{A} Move 4 towards the Entrance.
{A} Move 4 towards the Entrance.

If the Courier is not carrying the data core:

{-} The other two closest Imperial figures become <color="red">Focused</color>.
